USBAgent(8) System Manager's Manual USBAgent(8)

NAME

USBAgent —
Agent for USB devices.

SYNOPSIS

NONE (launched by launchd)

DESCRIPTION

USBAgent allows the system to to present notifications related to USB devices.

This command is not intended to be invoked directly.

FILES

/usr/libexec/USBAgent
 

SEE ALSO

launchd(8) usbd(8)

HISTORY

The USBAgent daemon first appeared in OS X 10.9.
November 16, 2012 OS X
